metadata.title: CVE-2019-5489 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: The mincore() implementation in mm/mincore.c in the Linux kernel through4.19.13 allowed local attackers to observe page cache access patterns ofother processes on the same system, potentially allowing sniffing of secretinformation. (Fixing this affects the output of the fincore program.)Limited remote exploitation may be possible, as demonstrated by latencydifferences in accessing public files from an Apache HTTP Server.
